articles.title: Guinean national committee formed to remember Kim Il Sung
Second people's rally held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Guinean national committee formed to remember Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for Remembering Great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Conakry on June 6 with due ceremony.
 Almami Fode Silla, minister of technical education and vocational training of guinea, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee discussed and decided on the matters of widely introducing the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and the validity of the army-based policy of leader Kim Jong Il.
